sentence.Network_en: Paul Reichmann offered to ante up $2 million.
sentence.Network_cn: 保罗·赖克曼出价到200万美金。

sentence.Network_en: The publisher upped the ante for the biography by offering 1000 yuan.
sentence.Network_cn: 这家出版社提高了这部传记的预约稿酬,愿比其竞争对手多付1000元.

sentence.Network_en: His ex - wife has upped the ante in her alimony suit against him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的 前妻 在诉讼中要求提高赡养费.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 决胜七张牌底注(ante)和Bring-in数额由相关牌桌限额决定。一般来说，Bring-in约为小注的一半，而底注(ante)则约为小注的四分之一。
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... ante post 赌于赛马前 ante 赌注 anteater 食蚁兽.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... （oc 再次＋ （ante 前＋ （suc 随后＋.
ant加一个字母能组成什么单词?_百度知道 ... nant 小河谷 ante 下赌注；付款 anta 壁角柱；壁端柱.

list.abs: 灾难节目 - National Geographic Channel -... ... 节目: 历史奇案 History's Secrets 行军蚁 Army Ants 火爆家族 Family Combat.
...语迅速进入英语语汇的现象十分普遍，比如最近流行的“蚁族(ant tribe)”和“给力（gelivable）”就是。
有没有好看的香港电影_百度知道 ... 《致命拜访》( The Visiting) 《别惹蚂蚁》( Ant Bully) 《谷仓》( Barnyard).

jx.jx_en_mean: increase what is at stake or under discussion, especially in a conflict or dispute
jx.jx_cn_mean: （尤指冲突或争议中）加大赌注，冒更大风险

lj.lj_ly: he decided to up the ante in the trade war.
lj.lj_ls: 他决定在贸易战中提高要价。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from Latin, literally before'

entry.tran: （在争议或争夺中）提高要求，增加筹码
entry.def: If you up the ante or raise the ante, you increase your demands when you are in dispute or fighting for something.

means.word_mean: 1. (poker) the initial contribution that each player makes to the pot

sentences.en: When his wife was awarded alimony by the court,Snow had to ante up.
sentences.cn: 当他的太太被法庭判定获有离婚赡养费时,斯诺不得不付这笔钱。
